techmeme.title: A US district judge rules Trump Media and Rumble do not need to remove US-based accounts of a top Jair Bolsonaro supporter, despite a Brazilian judge's order (Jonathan Stempel/Reuters)
Filing: ON Semiconductor plans to cut 2,400 employees, or 9% of its workforce, with charges related to the layoffs expected to cost around $50M to $60M (Katherine Hamilton/Wall Street Journal)
YouTube will show fewer mid-roll ads that interrupt sentences or action sequences, and more ads at "natural break points" like transitions, starting May 12 (Wes Davis/The Verge)
A Twitch channel called Claude Plays Pokémon is streaming Claude 3.7 Sonnet using its reasoning capabilities to play a game of Pokémon Red (Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch)
Coupang reports Q4 revenue up 21% YoY to $7.97B, vs. $8.08B est., and operating income of $312M, vs. $167.8M est.; CPNG jumps 5%+ after hours (Yoolim Lee/Bloomberg)
